alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 10:22AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Rockport. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 28.5 feet, minor over bank flooding is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 22.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue rising to 28.5 feet next Monday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Rockport 25.0 22.6 Mon 9 am CDT 21.8 24.5 26.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
